website_summaries.verdict: Ships with a huge toothbrush, making it fun to teach children how to brush their teeth.
pros: Fits in the palm of the hand
Model consists of a hard plastic, which allows it to be used over and over
Even small children can handle the included large toothbrush to practice brushing the teeth in the model
cons: Weighs quite a bit more than other models

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great tool for Speech therapy to show tongue placement for producing sounds
customer_reviews.author: mom of 2

customer_reviews.title: Great for teaching a child how to brush.
customer_reviews.text: Great teaching tool for our 3 y/o. He now has a great visual of all his teeth and the proper way of caring for his teeth. I didn't read the the measurement carefully so I was quite surprised at how large the product was. I wish the teeth were spaced a bit more so flossing would be easier. However, it is not impossible. Overall, very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: a

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I'm a speech language pathologist and I love using this mouth model during articulation therapy!
customer_reviews.author: CO

customer_reviews.title: but was so happy it was
customer_reviews.text: Much bigger than I anticipated.....but was so happy it was!! I teach Kinder students oral health. They get sooo excited when I bring 'chomper' out to help teach. The mouth flexes open completely flat so students can see all sides of the teeth. For the price...amazing model!
customer_reviews.author: jlow

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it, but it came undone.
customer_reviews.text: My preschoolers loved this giant model and the toothbrush, but the metal pulled right out of the back while a kid was holding it, and the mouth dropped onto my preschooler. It's very heavy for a little fit. I suggest tugging hard on the metal and if it comes out, then glue it in place before letting kids play with it.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Good for teaching how to brush
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my granddaughter she loves playing with it.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda Tishel-Lupella

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Ajax Scientific ANO20-0002 Plastic Dental Model is very useful for students who has to learn proper dental care. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Mildred

customer_reviews.title: But very nice.
customer_reviews.text: I had the dimensions but seeing it in person: Wow it is BIG! But very nice.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: It's fun to use in educating children in schools
customer_reviews.text: It's fun to use in educating children in schools, but lacks of flexibility on the opened and closed once again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: my children like brushing it
customer_reviews.text: Very well built, my children like brushing it. Very nice, large size.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond Zehr

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Came Broken. I should have returned it but needed it for school.
customer_reviews.author: Kara Dennings

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: Yes definitely above my expectations. Very satisfied with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Ajax Scientific AN020-0002 Plastic Dental Care Model with Giant Toothbrush, 6 x 4.5 x 5 Inches
product_meta.description:
The Ajax Scientific AN020-0002 hard plastic dental model includes an oversize toothbrush for demonstration and to provide students with hands-on experience with tooth-brushing exercises. The hard plastic construction provides durability for routine handling and cleaning. The model comes with instructions and information about tooth structure, dental decay, and flossing in English, French, and German. It is 6 x 4.5 x 5 inches (H x W x D, where H is height, the vertical distance from the lowest to highest point; W is width, the horizontal distance from left to right; D is depth, the horizontal distance from front to back). Health education models are typically used as educational aids in medical and scientific classrooms and office settings.

Science education products incorporate applied math and science principles into classroom and homeschool-based projects. Teachers in pre-K, elementary, and secondary classrooms use science education kits and products alongside science, technology, engineering, and math (STEM) curriculum to demonstrate STEM concepts and real-world applications through hands-on activities. Science education projects include a broad range of activities, such as practical experiments in engineering, aeronautics, robotics, energy, chemistry, physics, biology, and geology.

Ajax Scientific distributes scientific equipment, supplies, and instruments for industrial, research, and educational applications. The company, founded in 1984, is headquartered in Toronto, ON, Canada.

WHAT'S IN THE BOX?
 * Dental care model
 * Oversize toothbrush
 * Instructions
feature_bullets: Hard plastic dental model with oversize toothbrush for health education
Large plastic toothbrush provides students hands-on experience with tooth-brushing exercises
Hard plastic construction provides durability for routine handling and cleaning
6 x 4.5 x 5 inches (H x W x D)
Comes with instructions in English, French, and German with information about tooth structure, dental decay, and flossing instructions
